name: Circuit Shift
description:
In "Circuit Shift" you have to navigate a cube through a maze of rectangles by shifting them into the right position, all in real time. 

But beware, all the bricks shift at the same time, so plan ahead, but keep in mind your moves. 

Controls:

Spacebar - Switch the rectangles

Esc - Back to the Main Menu

Developed by: 

Daniil Khokhonov & Rüdiger Brandis
